Sergio Marchionne told dealers and industry executives he believes it is important that Chrysler maintain its "American nature." That American nature needs to be preserved for its ultimate success, he said to applause. "We can open up the world to Chrysler, we can do a number of things, but I can not turn it into an Italian car company."

2001 I never imagined-even in my wildest dreams-that we would get as far, as fast as we have today," Mr. Eric Schmidt said in a post on the Official Google Inc. Blog. Search has quite literally changed people's lives-increasing the collective sum of the world's knowledge and revolutionizing advertising in the process. And our emerging businesses-display, Android, YouTube and Chrome-are on fire. Of course, like any successful organization we've had our fair share of good luck, but the entire team-now over 24,000 Googlers globally-deserves most of the credit. Google Inc.
